---
name: V1.4 Simple Outputs
on:
  issues:
    types: [opened, edited]
permissions:
  issues: write
  pull_requests: read
outputs:
  add-comment: true
  add-label: true
  remove-label: true
allowed-actors:
  - admin
  - write
---

# V1.4 Agent with Simple Outputs

This represents a v1.4 agent with simple boolean outputs (no config objects).

Uses allowed-actors for authorization (before allowed-users and allowed-teams existed).
